pr_title: SW_1 - Implement dynamic computation of EDT, LAT and SearchWindow.

timeline.message:
Implement dynamic computation of EDT, LAT and SearchWindow (#2931). Automatic resolve request parameters using raptor heuristic search. The 'earliest departure time'(EDT), 'latest arrival time'(LAT) and 'raptor search window' is calculated from heuristics using standard "singel-iteration" raptor forward/reverse search.
 - Regression, make arriveBy work.
 - Turn 'waitAtBeginning' off.
 - Rename 'waitAtBeginningEnabled' to 'allowWaitingBetweenAccessAndTransit'.

Implement dynamic computation of EDT, LAT and SearchWindow (#2931). Automatic resolve request parameters using raptor heuristic search. The 'earliest departure time'(EDT), 'latest arrival time'(LAT) and 'raptor search window' is calculated from heuristics using standard "singel-iteration" raptor forward/reverse search.
 - Regression, make arriveBy work.
 - Turn 'waitAtBeginning' off.
 - Rename 'waitAtBeginningEnabled' to 'allowWaitingBetweenAccessAndTransit'.

timeline.bodyText: Add Javadoc explaining why this is needed.
timeline.author: abyrd

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/org/opentripplanner/transit/raptor/api/response/RaptorResponse.java b/src/main/java/org/opentripplanner/transit/raptor/api/response/RaptorResponse.java
index 610593f56..fbe513095 100644
--- a/src/main/java/org/opentripplanner/transit/raptor/api/response/RaptorResponse.java
+++ b/src/main/java/org/opentripplanner/transit/raptor/api/response/RaptorResponse.java

@@ -6,6 +6,15 @@ import org.opentripplanner.transit.raptor.api.transit.RaptorTripSchedule;
 
 import java.util.Collection;
 
+
+/**
+ * This is the result of a raptor search including the the result paths, the original request
+ * (unmodified) and the the main request used to perform the raptor search. The {@link
+ * org.opentripplanner.transit.raptor.RaptorService} might perform additional heuristic searches,
+ * too, but the requests for these are not returned.
+ *
+ * @param <T> The TripSchedule type defined by the user of the raptor API.
+ */
 public class RaptorResponse<T extends RaptorTripSchedule> {
     private final Collection<Path<T>> paths;
     private final RaptorRequest<T> requestOriginal;
